text: Hello everyone, I was trying to submit my theme to the marketplace and I am getting this error. Any ideas on how to fix it?

Hey Oswaldo- looks like `<http://kalungi.com>` redirects to `<http://www.kalungi.com>` - if you update your listing or provider profile (whichever includes this) to specify `<http://www.kalungi.com>`  instead I believe it'll work
I can push out a fix to follow redirects, but if you're in a rush to submit, using the `www` link will fix it

Hi everyone for the theme hackathon submission, I am not quite for sure what the checkbox option is that reads: ‘I am submitting on behalf of a solutions partner team’.

Does the solutions partner team mean a HubSpot partner company?
I have been DMd with the appropriate information. For some reason that term seemed foreign to me. Thanks everyone!
Thank you, I'll try it out
